data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Guyei.
À daaseigi ná-lɛbiyai maamusɛ!
À ɠɛ GALA ma: «Ɗa-ɠɛɛwotiiti maayikiʋɛ!
Eteai pɛ ka nɔkɔ è wu,
À ʋa wo GALA ná-kɛɛwotiiti pɛtɛ!
É kpoloɗɛi valiboni, é kɛ ga zou vɔɔi,
Toɠa masadai ɠɛɛzu eyɛsu ɠɔ ná-zɛbɛi ʋɔ,
Nuɓusɛiti, à gá-ƓALAGI mama,
Gá vulua tɔun saalai zu,
Ee, GALA, è gi ʋoluɠulani!
Gi ɠɛni è ya tumɔi zu, è ɗa ʋa ga giye,
è zobogi veeni gi zili nui ʋɛ, é zei gi unda,
Nà liizu ɗa-ʋɛlɛi wu ga gala zalaɠaiti,
niiti dàkɔlɔgiti ti ti woni,
Nà gala zalaɠaiti kula è ʋɛ, ti wulɔai,
À ʋa wo woilo, wɔiti kpein wo luazu GALA ba,
Gè wooɠulani ma,
Ni gè ɠɛni faa ɲɔi makɛni zìimaʋɛ,
Kɛlɛ wɛlɛ, GALA ge woiloni gòoi ma,
Mamagi ɠa GALA bɛ,
